content:
identifier        topic-name            description                                                                                                              entity
-----------------  -----------------------  --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------  --------------------------------------------------------------------------
210ee06996f547dc8  Query Deoptimization     Identifies and addresses issues in SQL queries that are causing suboptimal database performance.                                  643e6b56460d47f2b, 7dd3675b77d24cad8, 246ac96516264ef08
1ba2f62d908d4eb19  Query Optimization       Refers to the process of improving the efficiency and performance of SQL queries.                                                 96a940dbb02142f8a, 3493454544f84b97a, bc2e6037292348df8
eaf5f4e9585340c2b  User Access Management   Manages user access and permissions for a database, ensuring that only authorized users have access to sensitive data.            de85f971a1754f158, 6ec4feb7f615478c8, 6fb173bea1514b33b, b498d89cf74644a9a
ae6debdaa0154297b  Database Administration  Involves managing and maintaining databases, including tasks such as performance tuning, security management, and data recovery.  36cba70735f44c128, 92f0df66fb6545879, c84b7f68a79b4c1d9, be4e85295e7847009

id          name               entity-description                                         possible-values
-----------------  ------------------------  ---------------------------------------------------------  --------------------------------------------------------
643e6b56460d47f2b  database_name             The name of the database to query.
7dd3675b77d24cad8  time_range                The time range for which to query deoptimization events.   last_hour, last_day, last_week, last_month
246ac96516264ef08  event_type                The type of deoptimization event to query.
96a940dbb02142f8a  database_type             The type of database being optimized.                      relational, non-relational, graph, time-series
3493454544f84b97a  optimization_goal         The goal of the optimization.
bc2e6037292348df8  database_tool             The tool used for optimization.                            MySQL Workbench, pgAdmin, MongoDB Compass, Neo4j Desktop
de85f971a1754f158  user_role                 The role of the user in the database system.               admin, power_user, standard_user, read_only
6ec4feb7f615478c8  database_name             The name of the database that access needs to be managed.
6fb173bea1514b33b  access_level              The level of access granted to the user.                   full, read_write, read_only, none
b498d89cf74644a9a  user_id                   The unique identifier of the user.                         12345, 67890, 11111, 22222
36cba70735f44c128  database_type             The type of database to be administered.                   relational, non-relational, in-memory, distributed
92f0df66fb6545879  database_operation        The database operation to perform.
c84b7f68a79b4c1d9  database_management_tool  The database management tool to use.
be4e85295e7847009  database_platform         The platform hosting the database.
